diff_act: 1.offer a variety of emoticons for enriching messages

regen.absent_element: offering and supporting the use of emoticons
regen.new_specification: The application shall offer a variety of emoticons for enriching messages and support their use in chat messages.
The application shall offer a variety of emoticons to users and support the use of these emoticons while composing messages.

regen.absent_element: support for offering and using emoticons
regen.new_specification: The application should offer a variety of emoticons for users to add to their messages, enhancing the expressiveness of their communication.

label: Display a list of emoticons to choose from when the user wants to include an emoticon in the message.
absence: support of selecting emoticons when the user wants to include an emoticon in the message
